lead_paragraph: Hillary Rodham Clinton is the one figure uniting religious conservatives frustrated by a leaderless Republican Party that's divided over foreign policy, immigration and social issues.

headline.main: Religious Conservatives Opposed to Hillary Clinton
headline.print_headline: Religious Conservatives Opposed to Hillary Clinton
